module Hydrocraft
{
    imports
    {
        Base

    }

/************************ITEMS************************/

item HCLargetup
    {
        Weight    			= 0.8,
	CanStoreWater			= TRUE,
        Type    			= Normal,
        DisplayName         		= Large Tupperware Container,
	ReplaceOnUseOn			= WaterSource-HCLargetupwater,
        icon 				= HCLargetup,
	RainFactor 			= 1,
    }

item HCLargetupfood
	{
	HungerChange			=	-60,
	Weight				=	1.6,
	Type				=	Food,
	DaysTotallyRotten		=	30,
	UnhappyChange			=	10,
	DisplayName			=	Large Tupperware Container with Food,
	Icon				=	HCLargetupfood,
	ReplaceOnUse			=	HCLargetup,
	DaysFresh			=	15,
	}

item HCLargetuplid
    {

        DisplayName         		= Large Tupperware Lid,
        icon 				= HCLargetuplid,
    }

    {

        Type    			= Normal,
        DisplayName         		= Large Tupperware Container without Lid,
        icon 				= HCLargetupbowl,
    }

item HCLargetupwater
    {
	IsWaterSource			=	TRUE,
	Weight				=	1.6,
	CanStoreWater			=	TRUE,

	UseWhileEquipped		=	FALSE,
	UseDelta			=	0.02,
	DisplayName			=	Large Tupperware Container with Water,

/************************RECIPES************************/
    


recipe Put Lid on Large Tupperware Container
    {
    HCLargetuplid,
    HCLargetupbowl,
    Result:HCLargetup,
    Time:15,
    }

    {
    HCLargetup,
    Result:HCLargetupbowl,
    Time:15,
    OnCreate:recipe_hclargetuplid,
    }

    HCMediumtuplid,

    }
